org.corfudb.infrastructure

Class NettyServerRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
      • io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
        • org.corfudb.infrastructure.NettyServerRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler, IServerRouter

    @ChannelHandler.Sharable
public class NettyServerRouter
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
implements IServerRouter
    The netty server router routes incoming messages to registered roles using the Created by mwei on 12/1/15.

public void addServer(AbstractServer server)

      • validateEpoch

        public boolean validateEpoch(CorfuMsg msg,
                             io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx)
        Validate the epoch of a CorfuMsg, and send a WRONG_EPOCH response if the server is in the wrong epoch. Ignored if the message type is reset (which is valid in any epoch).
        Parameters:
        msg - The incoming message to validate.
        ctx - The context of the channel handler.
        Returns:
        True, if the epoch is correct, but false otherwise.
